codeset.description: Codeset for this code (ICD9 or ICD10)

code.description: Actual ICD code for this diagnosis

note.description: The note entered for this diagnosis.

description.description: Brief description for this SNOMED Code

appointmentid.description: Athena appointment ID resulting in this encounter

departmentid.description: The athena department ID of this encounter

encountervisitname.description: The visit name for this encounter

encountertype.description: Type of encounter (FLOWSHEET, ORDERSONLY, VISIT, etc.). By default only VISIT and ORDERSONLY are shown, use INCLUDEALLtypeS flag to see others.

status.description: Status of this encounter (CLOSED, OPEN, PEND). By default only OPEN, CLOSED, and REVIEW statuses are shown, use INCLUDEALLSTATUSES flag to see others.

patientlocationid.description: Athena ID for the patient location

patientstatusid.description: Athena ID for the patient status

providerid.description: The ID of the provider for this encounter

providerfirstname.description: First name of the provider for this encounter

providerlastname.description: Last name of the provider for this encounter

providerphone.description: Phone number of the provider for this encounter

lastupdated.description: The date the encounter was last updated
